name: Vampire: The Recurrence of The Vampire's Nightmare
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To play this software on your PLAYSTATION®3 system, you must have at least 55MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system hard disk.
To play this software on your PSP®, you must install the latest system software version and have a Memory Stick Duo™ with the free space stated above.
For more detailed information about downloading to your PSP® system, please see URL below.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.
??

?Game description
The crazed vampire Duran has awakened after a long sleep. In order to protect the vampire clan and the entire world from Duran, the young vampire Christopher charges into 19th Century Europe! Converse and plot with citizens of various livelihoods during the afternoon segment. Transform into a wolf, a bat, or mist at night to drink the blood of the people and increase your minions. Survive the battle against Van Helsing's "Vampire Hunter" squad and Duran's Dampeils.
The story will take you all around Europe, all the way to the city of mist, London!
It's the ultimate gothic horror simulation!

?The "PocketStation" is not compatible.
